action_desc: Select the '2020 Apple MacBook Air Laptop' from the search results to view its details and add it to the cart.
action_result:
By clicking on the first search result for the "2020 Apple MacBook Air Laptop" from the search results page, I have navigated to the detailed product page of this MacBook Air. This action moves me closer to completing the user request, as the next step is to add this item to the shopping cart.

However, the user’s request also includes showing the shopping cart, and I have not yet done that. To fully address the request, I will need to locate and click on the cart icon to view it and proceed to add the MacBook Air to the cart.

In conclusion, this action has brought us one step closer to completing the request but still requires showing the cart and adding the item to it.
prev_action_result:
